entry.title: Thursday night: Snow mixed with rain. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow. Snow mixed with rain late this evening. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 9:05 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 5 in the afternoon. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few flurries ending in the morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 50 early in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 5 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 9:05 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023
